response.headline: Day trip to Suwon from Seoul featuring fortress walls, hanok alleys, and vibrant cafes
response.summary: Take a quick train ride to Suwon to explore fortress walls, hanok alleys and vibrant cafes. Solo travelers can find 10 magical places and experiences in Seoul including hanok to waterfall cafes, day trips, and self-care stops.

extracted_text: Take a day trip to Suwon

Solo in Seoul? Here are 10 places and experiences that prove exploring the city on your own can be just as magical
Things To Do In Seoul Korea
